mean_cn: n. 滑稽模仿（对电影、电视节目等）；  v. 滑稽地模仿
mean_en: a humorous movie, book, play, etc., that copies something in a silly and exaggerated way
short_phrase: The little boy spoofs the little girl.
sentence: This painting is a spoof of the famous actress.
sentence_trans: 这幅画是对著名女演员玛丽莲·梦露的滑稽模仿。
sentence_phrase: a spoof of the famous actress
